author: KinoCheck.com
description:
This time in the #KinoCheckNews "James Bond", “Spider-Man: Brand New Day”, “X-Men” etc.| App ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/App | Best Movie News Show | All News https://KinoCheck.com/news

00:00 James Bond: "Dune" Director Denis Villeneuve Shoots the Next 007!
Finally: The new Bond director has been confirmed! For a long time, there had been speculation about Christopher Nolan or "Gravity" director Alfonso Cuarón. But now, the choice has been made for another filmmaking heavyweight: Denis Villeneuve will direct the next film in the spy series…

02:08 Jon Bernthal as Punisher in Spider-Man 4: Brand New Day
The Punisher is returning to the big screen! As the industry magazine The Hollywood Reporter has learned, Jon Bernthal will be seen in "Spider Man: Brand New Day"…

04:16 New Trailers
This week's hot trailers offer a lot of variety. Including: “Fantastic Four: First Steps”, ‘Weapons’ and “Bugonia”, the new film by Yorgos Lanthimos with Emma Stone and Jesse Plemmons...

06:06 Box Office New
title: THE BEST MOVIE NEWS 2025: New James Bond, Spider-Man 4, X-Men, Highlander, The Social Network 2...
